forked_key.name: Forked Key
forked_key.description: Opens a chest at the crossroads.

ancient_scroll.name: Ancient Scroll
ancient_scroll.description: Faded text hints at forgotten lore.

health_amulet.description: Permanently increases max HP when found

blueprint_amulet.description: Instructions for crafting a health amulet

blueprint_health_amulet.description: A parchment detailing how to fuse potions into an amulet

commander_badge.name: Commander Badge
commander_badge.description: Proof of defeating the scout commander

scout_blade.name: Scout Blade
scout_blade.description: A light blade carried by goblin scouts

bone_shard.name: Bone Shard
bone_shard.description: Fragment useful for crafting defensive charms

cracked_helmet.name: Cracked Helmet
cracked_helmet.description: Barely held together after many battles.

armor_piece.name: Armor Piece
armor_piece.description: A chunk of metal that can be forged into protection.

defense_potion_I.description: Increases defense by 1 for this fight.

faded_blade.name: Faded Blade
faded_blade.description: Vaelin's weathered weapon. Use in combat to gain +2 attack for the fight.

arcane_crystal.name: Arcane Crystal
arcane_crystal.description: A crystal infused with raw arcana.

faded_letter.name: Faded Letter
faded_letter.description: The writing is smudged but hints at a forgotten past.

old_coin.name: Old Coin
old_coin.description: A weathered coin from ages past.

recall_shard.name: Recall Shard
recall_shard.description: A fragment pulsing with lost memory.
